body_html:
Here is another public project that this happens on:
https://github.com/achainan/posture.pytorch

Here is the relevant line:
https://github.com/achainan/posture.pytorch/blob/b6dc25bd206b33a7c2cbbc4ef73b56c71c99cd98/train.py#L59

I'm using the latest pytorch at 36bbaf0

The error is similar:

Fatal Python error: Segmentation fault

Thread 0x0000700002b08000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x00007000025ff000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x00007000024f9000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x00007fffd9efe3c0 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 736 in start
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 228 in __init__
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 417 in __iter__
  File "posture/train.py", line 129 in validate
  File "posture/train.py", line 103 in main
  File "posture/train.py", line 225 in <module>

body:
Here is another public project that this happens on:
https://github.com/achainan/posture.pytorch

Here is the relevant line:
https://github.com/achainan/posture.pytorch/blob/b6dc25bd206b33a7c2cbbc4ef73b56c71c99cd98/train.py#L59

I'm using the latest pytorch at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/36bbaf0d859ff052ac6e991b7d909e9ff15ae70f

The error is similar:
```
Fatal Python error: Segmentation fault

Thread 0x0000700002b08000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x00007000025ff000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x00007000024f9000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x00007fffd9efe3c0 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 736 in start
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 228 in __init__
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 417 in __iter__
  File "posture/train.py", line 129 in validate
  File "posture/train.py", line 103 in main
  File "posture/train.py", line 225 in <module>
```
